title: The possibility of pulmonary hypertension.
body:
After reading through a lot of post on StemSocial, I have decided to create my first stem post.

The first time I heard about Pulmonary Hypertension was when I went to spend the weekend with a friend who works at a hospital, she came back home from work to tell me about a patent with pulmonary hypertension.

### What exactly is Pulmonary Hypertension?

Pulmonary hypertension is actually a type of high blood pressure, this high blood pressure affects the pulmonary arteries. Pulmonary arteries are blood vessels that carry blood (oxygen-poor) from the heart to the lungs. 

Pulmonary hypertension is actually really dangerous, it actually disrupts the flow of blood through the heart and lungs, it causes the arteries to become narrow, therefore, giving the heart more work by making it pump oxygen-poor blood into the lungs. The extra effort taken to pump the blood eventually makes the heart muscle weak and of course, fails in the long run.
